last_episode_to_air.name: Exit Laughing
last_episode_to_air.overview: A minor civil servant is found dead in exotic circumstances, and Maggie tries to protect his widow from publicity.

name: The Gentle Touch
overview: The Gentle Touch is a British police drama television series made by London Weekend Television for ITV which ran from 1980-1984. Commencing transmission on 11 April 1980, the series is notable for being the first British series to feature a female police detective as its leading character, ahead of the similarly themed BBC series Juliet Bravo by four months.

episodes.name: Shock
episodes.overview: Maggie is assigned to investigate the death of a woman discovered in a love nest.

episodes.name: Menaces
episodes.overview: When Ivor Stocker, a J.P. and successful businessman, rteceives a blackmail threat, it becomes a case for Det-Insp. Maggie Forbes...

episodes.name: Hammer
episodes.overview: A series of robberies with violence have been reported. All have a similar pattern, and all are carried out by women.   Maggie Forbes and her police team are puzzled to know who these women are. Or could it be one woman in many disguises.

episodes.name: Chance
episodes.overview: Det.-Insp. Maggie Forbes spends a frustrating day at the law courts. She feels she would be much usefully employed trying to solve the criminal cases that keep arriving on her desk.

episodes.name: The Hit
episodes.overview: Detective Inspector Forbes has a marksman with a high-powered rifle loose on her patch.

episodes.name: Black Fox, White Vixen
episodes.overview: A famous television actress received death threats.

episodes.name: Pressures
episodes.overview: Maggie suffers severe stress when faced with a bloody multiple murder.

episodes.name: Who's Afraid of Josie Tate?
episodes.overview: When a loyal wife is determined to help her jailed husband get justice, Maggie is Forced to review the evidence.

episodes.name: The Good, the Bad and the Rest
Mad Dog
episodes.overview: When animal rights campaigners free some dogs from a labratory, but fail to realise that one of the animlas is dangerously ill, a children's birthday party becomes a terrible nightmare for Maggie Forbes.

episodes.name: Exit Laughing
episodes.overview: A minor civil servant is found dead in exotic circumstances, and Maggie tries to protect his widow from publicity.
